mosinstall.name: Your Cart Module
mosinstall.author: Sören Eberhardt
mosinstall.description: Shows the Cart for your Customers

param.name: useThickBox
param.label: Open the cart in a ThickBox?
param.description: ThickBox is a webpage UI dialog widget. It opens the cart in a new inline-window and hides the other part of the website under a gray overlay.

param.name: moduleID
param.label: The ID of the Mini Cart Part in the module
param.description: The ID in the cart module that allows to identify the mini cart part for updating it via Ajax.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: class_sfx
param.label: Menu Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items
